mapper.select: select notice_number, notice_title, notice_content, notice_creator_id, notice_modifier_id, notice_creation_time, notice_modification_time, top_fixed, top_fixed_priority from board where notice_number= #{notice_number}

select notice_number, notice_title, notice_content, notice_creator_id, notice_modifier_id, notice_creation_time, notice_modification_time, top_fixed, top_fixed_priority from board order by notice_creation_time desc, notice_number desc

select notice_number, notice_title, notice_content, notice_creator_id, notice_modifier_id, notice_creation_time, notice_modification_time, top_fixed, top_fixed_priority from board order by notice_creation_time desc, notice_number desc limit #{offset}, #{pageSize}
mapper.insert: insert into board (notice_title, notice_content, notice_creator_id) values (#{notice_title}, #{notice_content}, #{notice_creator_id})
mapper.delete: delete from board where notice_number=#{notice_number} and notice_creator_id=#{notice_creator_id}
mapper.update: update board set notice_title=#{notice_title}, notice_content=#{notice_content}, notice_modification_time=now() where notice_number=#{notice_number}
